JOB DESCRIPTION: As junior software engineer you will work with the senior software engineer to develop an ERP application in .Net 3.5 Experience: 1 - 3 yrs Education: B.E /  B.Tech /  M.E /  M.Tech /  M.C.A /  M.Sc -  Csc /  IT Minimal Requirements: Have good programming skills in .Net 3.5 with C# and understand and apply the important OO concepts and generics Experience in developing applications with Windows Forms Good communication skills (Fluent communication in English, report and documentation writing skills) Preferred skills: Understanding of advanced concepts such as Linq
